René Dalsgaard CEO Orbit Online A/S Address Orbit Online A/S Åbogade 25 8200 Århus N Denmark Phone +45 7734 4539 Email contact@orbit.online Name E-mail Message By signing up, you agree to our Orbit Online privacy policy . Move along, nothing to see here Send Our users on Orbit Orbit helped us achieve a better solution than we could have imagined. Through ongoing advice and guidance from Orbit, we now have a platform that suits our needs. Mila Stenbye Vester Business Development NCC Ultimately, the two decisive factors for choosing Orbit were the modern design style combined with great features that already met most of our needs. Raphael Fischer Application Engineer at SKAN AG We use Orbit daily to collect, store and manage our employees' skills documentation. Orbit provides a good overview, and we can extract various data for our projects and competency checks. Lea Zindorff Gram Projects at Aarsleff Rail Orbit's competence management solution provides us with the best overview. It helps us not only in relation to quality assurance and our ISO certification but also when we draft proposals. It's the only system we know of that offers interaction between competencies, CVs and references. Stinna Christensen Human Resources at Wicotec Kirkebjerg I just have to say - how cool is the new CV system? When you need a few words about a given employee, you look them up in a flash and move on with your work - freaking awesome. Trine Developer at NCC Footer End-to-end project management - from first sales contact to finished product. Orbit Trading & Contracting Co. Home Projects About us Contact Home Projects About us Contact Mehr More child Email Old Email Welcome to Orbit - Team Team Engineering & Contracting Wll. was incepted in 2001 by professionals the Construction & Project Management fields to cater to the needs of the ever expanding Qatari construction industry and Q companies. Since then, Team Engineering & Contracting Wll. has done many prestigious construction and interior projects and proved their credentials in the market. For more details. Our Mission To strive for par excellence and always endeavour to achieve the set goal in our construction and Fit Out works within professional & Ethical standards. Aim To ensure high quality finishes through experienced staff members embracing a professional approach. To identify, assess and acquire projects that require various skills embraced by our employees and ensuring client satisfaction; offering turnkey services of construction as well as a specialist contractor for finishes. We offer cost effective packages keeping in mind our broad based local and international database of manufacturers and suppliers while ensuring prompt & efficient services. We offer quality construction works, high quality carpentry & joinery products, decorative plaster works and various other floor/wall/ceiling finishes. We strive to approach the problem head-on tackling at its core in finding & executing the best suitable solution and in the process enforcing identification/planning/strategy/implementation. SCOPE Team Engineering & Contracting Wll. is providing professional services in the area of engineering construction, design & build concept, quantity surveying, site supervision, project management and trading. Team Engineering & Contracting Wll. has developed and implemented the Quality Management System (QMS) as described in this manual to help the organization to demonstrate their ability to consistently provide services that meet the customer & regulatory requirements and operate with increased effectiveness and efficiency with the overall aim of enhancing customer satisfaction. This manual also serves as a reference to the customer, auditor and all interested parties for the purpose of understanding the QMS adopted by Team Engineering & Contracting Wll. The requirements specified in the manual are aimed at achieving the Organizationâs commitment to Quality Policies & Objectives by providing guidance to all Team Engineering & Contracting WLLâs personnel and other interested parties. Team Engineering & Contracting WLLâs Quality Management System (QMS) documentation is written, implemented, and maintained to meet most current requirements of ISO9001:2000 with a scope for enhancement in the future. Contact Orbit19 As one of the few underground establishments in the Tampa Bay Area, word of mouth is the primary source of our success for the last 11 1/2 years. Orbit 19 is a dynamic meeting spot for people-watching, conducting business, and/or chilling out. Hidden behind an unassuming entrance the lounge hosts weekly events from bands to DJs in a diverse and relaxed setting.
